paragraphs.1: Takes note of the reports of the Secretary-General;
paragraphs.2: Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions;
paragraphs.3: Decides to appropriate to the special account for the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals a total amount of 56,126,600 United States dollars gross (51,268,200 dollars net) for the Mechanism for 2026, as detailed in annex I to the present resolution;
paragraphs.4: Also decides to apportion the amount of 28,063,300 dollars gross (25,634,100 dollars net) among Member States in accordance with the scale of assessments applicable to the regular budget of the United Nations for 2026;
paragraphs.5: Further decides to apportion the amount of 28,063,300 dollars gross (25,634,100 dollars net) among Member States in accordance with the scale of assessments applicable to peacekeeping operations of the United Nations for 2026;
paragraphs.6: Decides that, in accordance with the provisions of its resolution 973 (X) of 15 December 1955, there shall be set off against the apportionment among Member States, as provided for in paragraphs 4 and 5 above, their respective share in the Tax Equalization Fund of the estimated staff assessment income in the amount of 4,858,400 dollars approved for the Mechanism for 2026;
paragraphs.7: Also decides, in accordance with paragraph 4 of its resolution 80/ Annex II Credits reported in the financial performance report for 2024 Gross Net of staff assessment (United States dollars) Cancellation of commitments for the year 2023, and other revenue (8 894 000) (8 894 000) Surplus resulting from the final expenditure for the budget for the year 2024 (4 000) (862 600) Total credits reported in the financial performance report for 2024 8 898 000 9 756 600
